visualization

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualization.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the rules of the game. Such as speed. Has a board and an user for playing game.
    Author:
    EnesCakir

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String gameName,
            java.lang.String userName)
        Constructs new board and user for game. Set field to initial values.
        Parameters:
        gameName - name of the game.
        userName - name of the player from user.

    • Method Detail

      • moveVehicles

        public void moveVehicles()
        Move each vehicle on the game's vehicles arraylist steps that based on speed in their corresponding direction.

      • createVehicle

        public MyVehicle createVehicle()
        Create new vehicle checking the already created vehicles. Creation, type and lane of the vehicle are decided randomly. Once the vehicle created, if the lane is not available (occupied with some other vehicle), the newly created one is discarded.
        Returns:
        vehicle to be added to the board. If vehicles lane occupied with some other vehicle returns null.

      • checkVehicleCollisions

        private void checkVehicleCollisions()
        Checks collisions for moving cars. If they collide, changes their directions

      • checkCollisions

        public void checkCollisions()
        Checks both vehicle collisions and turtle collision.

      • waitFor

        public void waitFor(long millisecs)
        Wraps game's board waitFor method. Stops game for given millisecs.
        Parameters:
        millisecs - milliseconds to wait game.
        See Also:
        Board

      • isOver

        public boolean isOver()
        Checks the game status.
        Returns:
        true if game is over, otherwise false

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver()
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Manages game overing tasks. Saves user's score to text, and shows game over labels
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - couldn't find highscore.txt

      • showMessage

        public void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Wraps game board's updateMessage(String) method. Shows given message to player.
        Parameters:
        message - message to show player
        See Also:
        Board

      • addObject

        public void addObject(acm.graphics.GObject g)
        Wraps game board's addObject(GObject) method. Adds given object to board..
        Parameters:
        g - object to add board
        See Also:
        Board

      • addVehicle

        public void addVehicle(MyVehicle vehicle)
        Adds given vehicle to game's vehicles arrayList.
        Parameters:
        vehicle - vehicle to add arrayList

      • removeVehicles

        public void removeVehicles()
        Removes vehicles, if they are out of canvas.

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore()
        Updates user's score field and corresponding labels. Checks user's moving next round situation.
